name: Too many lanes
description:
Godot Wild Jam 32 submission.

Familiar with MOBAs? This time you are in charge of spawning the creeps and you have to make sure no enemy creeps reaches the end of the lane. Things are complicated by there being a few to many lanes and dice being your only tool.

- If an enemy creep reaches the end of the lane, that lane looses health.

- Power generate over time.

- The more lanes you loose, the faster your power generates.

- The longer you idle (not spawn creeps), the faster your power generates.

- Killing an enemy creep gives power.

- Your creep reaching the end of the lane gives power.

- Roll a dice in a lane to spawn creeps.

- A d20 costs 20 power and spawns 1-20 creeps etc.

- Keep at least one lane alive as long as possible.
